dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Good morning Andrew, I really can't figure out how to solve these two problems, I need your help!

dialogues.name: Teacher
dialogues.content: Good morning Vincent, I would love to be of assistance to you, but there happens to be a more important thing to tell you right now.

dialogues.name: Teacher
dialogues.content: This is Yvonne beside me, our new transfer student, I'll let her sit next to you in a while, so you can get acquainted first.

dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: Hello, I'm Yvonne. Nice to meet you.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Hello, Yvonne, I'm Vincent. Feel free to ask me anything you'd like to know about the school anytime!

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Of course, academic questions are also welcome!
